missing_sensor.title: Missing sensor data for {element_name}
missing_sensor.description:
The HAEO integration cannot find sensor data for element {element_name}. The sensor entity {sensor_entity_id} may not exist or may be unavailable.

To fix this issue:
1. Check that the sensor entity exists in Home Assistant
2. Verify the sensor is available and reporting data
3. If the sensor was removed, reconfigure the element to use a different sensor
4. If the sensor is temporarily unavailable, this issue will automatically dismiss when the sensor becomes available again

optimization_failure.title: Optimization failed
optimization_failure.description:
The HAEO optimization failed with the following error: {error_message}

This could be caused by:
1. Missing or invalid sensor/forecast data
2. Conflicting constraints in your configuration
3. Issues with the selected solver

Steps to resolve:
1. Check the Home Assistant logs for detailed error information
2. Verify all required sensors are available and reporting valid data
3. Review your network configuration for conflicting constraints
4. Try a different optimization solver in the integration settings
5. This issue will automatically dismiss when optimization succeeds

invalid_config.title: Invalid configuration for {element_name}
invalid_config.description:
Element '{element_name}' has an invalid configuration: {config_problem}

To fix this issue:
1. Open the HAEO integration settings
2. Navigate to the '{element_name}' element configuration
3. Correct the configuration problem described above
4. Save your changes and reload the integration

disconnected_network.title: Network has disconnected components
disconnected_network.description:
Your HAEO network has {num_components} disconnected groups of elements that cannot exchange power.

To fix this issue:
1. Review the following groups: {component_summary}
2. Open the HAEO integration configuration options
3. Add or adjust connections so every element belongs to the same group
4. Save your changes; this issue will clear automatically once the network is fully connected
